snippet: In a sign that tensions remain high, supporters of the island nation’s former leader blocked President Mohammed Waheed Hassan from delivering an annual address on Thursday.
abstract: Hundreds of supporters of the Maldives former leader, Mohamed Nasheed, block the current president, Mohammed Waheed Hassan, from addressing Parliament in a sign that tensions are still running high.
lead_paragraph: In a sign that tensions remain high, supporters of the island nation’s former leader blocked President Mohammed Waheed Hassan from delivering an annual address on Thursday.

headline.seo: President Mohammed Waheed Hassan of the Maldives Blocked From Addressing Parliament
headline.main: Protesters Block Maldives President From Parliament Address
headline.print_headline: Maldives: Protesters Block President From Parliament
